climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Gentle for sensitive skin - No more skin irritation and allergies making it safe for a newborn baby; Our natural laundry soap contains mostly plant-derived ingredients with no harsh ingredients
Easy to use - No more messy measuring cups, powder and sticky pods; Our sheet is precut and premeasured so you can say goodbye to overspillage; Wash all types of clothes, fabric, whites and color
Dissolves easily - Our concentrated sheets has strong cleaning power and are biodegradable. Works in all water temperatures and compatible with front and top loading, high efficiency washing machine
Zero waste and eco friendly - Say goodbye to single-use plastic jugs and packaging that pollute our landfills and oceans; Our package is made from natural materials, is recyclable and septic safe
Save space and travel friendly - Our waterless sheets is compact and lightweight; Easily stock up and store them in your drawer or pack them in your carry on for your next flight or camping trip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well!!
reviews.reviewText: I started using this product about a year ago and LOVE it!! It doesn't take up space in my laundry area, is very environmentally friendly, easy to use, and gets my clothes at least as clean as the detergent pods I used to use. I have the Ocean Breeze and the scent is barely noticeable (if you like a lighter scent on your clothes). I have sent boxes of these as gifts and am on the regular delivery plan so I never run out!! Get some- you won't be sorry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight travel suds, great cleaning power
reviews.reviewText: I order the unscented ones for family allergies. Recently I cut several sheets into thirds and put in a baggie to use when rinsing out socks and underthings on a long trip. They did a great job and helped me pack for a ten day trip with only a tote and a small carryon bag. It was great not having to schlep a large suitcase through several airports and public transportation. When the grandkids come to visit I use these sheets on tablecloths, bibs and little tees to get out the food stains and fingerpaint that is so hard to beat! I love these also because they're good for the environment and lots easier than heavy plastic jugs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy for travel
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these Kind Detergent Sheets for an overseas, multi-city trip. If you have been to Europe, you know that you have to pull your suitcase up and down stairs, onto trains, small sidewalks (if they have them), or on cobblestones. There is a lot of walking required and lightweight luggage is a must! We wanted to be able to pack fewer clothes and wash along the way. These detergent sheets (plus a travel clothes line) made for a good solution.I stored the flat detergent sheets in a ziplock back in my suitcase. When washing laundry, I tore the sheet into pieces before adding to wash so that it would dissolve more easily. We were very pleased with the clean laundry on our trip. The price was way more than I wanted to pay, but it did provide us with a solution for having to bring a lot more clothing on our trip. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low impact laundry soap, without the plastics
reviews.reviewText: Looking to move away from plasic bins full of pods to something that was low-scent, plastic free, and still convenient. Kind Laundry Sheets fit the bill perfectly. Clothes come out clean. One box lasts as long as the tub of pods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work really well, even in cold water
reviews.reviewText: We have a front-loading washing machine, and these sheets work really well, whether thrown in with the load, or in the dispenser. I tend to use two sheets with a normal-to-large load, and maybe one in the pre wash, if necessary. So for me, they don’t last 60 loads, but they’re still good value.Because a family member is sensitive, I use the unscented version, and it really is unscented! I use white vinegar as the fabric softener, which also leaves no scent, and my laundry is always just clean.These sheets don’t leave any kind of residue, and I love that the packaging is so small and compact.I waited to use quite a bit of them before leaving a review, because different laundry might do better with these, but these are great with the hot water blasts with bleach AND the cold water gentle washes.I’m happy to recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less Waste (No Plastic!!)
reviews.reviewText: Laundry detergent that comes in sheets and leaves my laundry clean without heavy scents. Nothing spills--ever! My favorite product--found on Shark Tank, years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Saves having to recycle a large plastic bottle. Detergent works great. Priced right. Great for trips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco-Friendly and Effective!
reviews.reviewText: Love the convenience and ease of just tossing one sheet in the washer. No huge jugs of soap. Laundry comes out very clean and fresh. The scent is light and not overpowering. Works on everything from my husbands smelly socks to my delicates. Love to throw a few in a bag to take with me when I travel. My skin is sensitive and I have no irritation or problems with this soap. I have coupled this laundry soap with wool dryer balls and feel really good about lessening my eco-footprint and have really clean laundry to boot!

I have been using another well-known eco friendly laundry sheet product but have found the last few orders of sheets have felt very plastic-like; hard to tear in half actually. Although they cleaned to my satisfaction, I thought I would try some alternatives. Having tried these I can say they dissolve readily and seem to be doing a fine job of cleaning all types of laundry. I appreciate that they are scented but not over the top. These sheets (as all laundry sheets I've look at) are made with PVA (which is still considered a plastic albeit water-soluble and biodegradable) but I suspect they contain less than the previous brand as the feel is more like a soft sponge vs. a firm, solid sheet. Currently using laundromat front load washers, I have found half a sheet to be more than adequate for a medium load - any more and you get way too many suds. I am happy with this product and will continue to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These sheets got my laundry clean without any issues. I bought the Ocean scented sheets however I failed to detect a scent so I added a few drops of essential oil into my machine drawer. This did the trick.They are quite expensive and probably wouldn't be cost effective for a family but there are only two of us and we only do two or three loads of washing per week so it works out at a few pounds per month. They come in a cardboard box so no plastic and take up little room. I am also glad there are no nasty chemicals in them. The sheets are smaller than I expected them to be but they got my laundry clean so I'm not concerned about that.Overall, I am very pleased with them. Of course I wish they weren't so expensive but hopefully the price will come down as more companies start selling the same.Delivery was just a few days after the order.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good smell, works well, easy to store
reviews.reviewText: Good smell, works well, easy to store

reviews.reviewTitle: Convenient, clean, innovative and does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product to try, I’ve recently discovered how many horrible chemicals there are in laundry detergents (even the ones that say they are “clean”) and I was so happy to see the short ingredient list on kind laundry. It’s also fragrance free (but don’t worry the laundry comes out smelling clean) and best of all it is mess free and helps our environment. Throw 1, 2 or 3 sheets in for heavy loads and you’re done. No measuring out or wasteful pod packs. The sheets would be great for travelling too for any on the go stuff you might need. Such a fan!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, does not take up much space and no strong smell of washing powder to make me sneeze
